channel.title: List on Dash's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in List on Dash's Blog

item.title: UVa OJ 11093 - Just Finish it up
item.description: Problem Along a circular track, there are N gas stations, which are numbered clockwise from 1 up to N. At station i, there are pi gallons of petrol available. To race from station i to its clockwise neighbor one need qi gallons of petrol. Consider a race where a car will start the race with an empty fuel tank. Your task is to find whether the car can complete the race from any of the stations or not.
